verses.text: Moreover the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* lifted me \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me unto the \w east|strong="H6931"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, which \w looketh|strong="H6437"\w* \w eastward|strong="H6921"\w*: and behold at the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*; \w among|strong="H8432"\w* whom I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Jaazaniah|strong="H2970"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azur|strong="H5809"\w*, and \w Pelatiah|strong="H6410"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, these \add are\add* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \w devise|strong="H2803"\w* \w mischief|strong="H0205"\w*, and \w give|strong="H3289"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* in this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*:

Which \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \add It is\add* not \w near|strong="H7138"\w*; let us \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*: this \add city is\add* the \w caldron|strong="H5518"\w*, and we \add be\add* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.\f + \fr 11.3 \ft It is…: or, It is not for us to build houses near\f*
¶ Therefore \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* against them, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*, O \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*.

And the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon me, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Speak|strong="H0559"\w*; Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; Thus have ye \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: for I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the things that \w come|strong="H4609"\w* into your \w mind|strong="H7307"\w*, \add every one of\add* them.

Ye have \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* your \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* in this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and ye have \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* thereof with the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Your \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* whom ye have \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of it, they \add are\add* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and this \add city is\add* the \w caldron|strong="H5518"\w*: but I will bring you \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of it.

Ye have \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; and I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* upon you, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

And I will bring you \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof, and \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* you into the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w*, and will \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgments|strong="H8201"\w* among you.

Ye shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; I will \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* you in the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

This \add city\add* shall not be your \w caldron|strong="H5518"\w*, neither shall ye be the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof; \add but\add* I will \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* you in the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

And ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for ye have not \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in my \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, neither \w executed|strong="H6213"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, but have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* after the \w manners|strong="H4941"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* that \add are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* you.\f + \fr 11.12 \ft for ye…: or, which have not walked\f*

¶ And it came to pass, when I \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w*, that \w Pelatiah|strong="H6410"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*. Then fell I \w down|strong="H5307"\w* upon my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* with a \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Ah|strong="H0162"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*! wilt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a full \w end|strong="H3617"\w* of the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?
Again the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add even\add* thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of thy \w kindred|strong="H1353"\w*, and all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* wholly, \add are\add* they unto whom the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* have \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Get you \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: unto us is this \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* in \w possession|strong="H4181"\w*.

Therefore \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Although I have cast them far \w off|strong="H7368"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and although I have \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* them among the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*, yet will I be to them as a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* in the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* where they shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.

Therefore \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will even \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* you from the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w assemble|strong="H0622"\w* you out of the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* where ye have been \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*, and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And they shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* thither, and they shall take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* all the detestable \w things|strong="H8251"\w* thereof and all the \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* thereof from thence.

And I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and I will \w put|strong="H5414"\w* a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* you; and I will \w take|strong="H5493"\w* the \w stony|strong="H0068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* out of their \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them an \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*:

That they may \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* mine \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them: and they shall be my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and I will be their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

But \add as for them\add* whose \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* after the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of their detestable \w things|strong="H8251"\w* and their \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*, I will \w recompense|strong="H5414"\w* their \w way|strong="H1870"\w* upon their own \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Then did the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* their \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*, and the \w wheels|strong="H0212"\w* \w beside|strong="H5980"\w* them; and the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add was\add* over them \w above|strong="H4605"\w*.

And the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* upon the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* which \add is\add* on the east \w side|strong="H6924"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

¶ Afterwards the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* took me \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me in a \w vision|strong="H4758"\w* by the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* into \w Chaldea|strong="H3778"\w*, to them of the \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*. So the \w vision|strong="H4758"\w* that I had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from me.
Then I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto them of the \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w* all the \w things|strong="H1697"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* me.
